subject: Re: [junit] Hi  Need help on Testing
msgSnippet: Hi, You can test Java (or J2EE) application using Jtest (parasoft product) and Jprobe(product of Sitrika Inc) testing tools. JTest will test your code against
messageBody:
Hi,
You can test Java (or J2EE) application using Jtest
(parasoft product) and Jprobe(product of Sitrika Inc)
testing tools.
JTest will test your code against Java coding
standards.You can also specify your own inputs to test
for runtime exceptions like Null Pointer etc.
JProbe has three important features :
1. code coverage : It will highlight the part of
the code which will never be executed. Eg unused
variables.
2. Profiler and Memory Leakage : It will high light
the methods or the parts of the code which will be
bottleneck for performance of your application.It will
also point the code which will cause memory leakage.
3.Threadalizer : This feature is used to test the
"Threads" and help us in avoiding deadlock state.

Hope it will be of use to you.

cheers,
jalam

--- vijay_cse2000@... wrote:
> Hi guys,
